Title: Since Otar Left
Writer: Julie Bertuccelli, Bernard Renucci, Roger Bohbot (adaptation), Alda Engoian (translation), Gotcha Djavakhichvili (translation), Miguel Machalski (translation)
Actors: Esther Gorintin, Nino Khomasuridze, Dinara Drukarova, Temur Kalandadze
Plot: The one joy in the lives of a mother and daughter comes from the regular letters sent to them from Paris from the family's adored son, Otar. When the daughter finds out that Otar has died ...
